Caption: Table 1. Coded paper counts. For categories (3–5), we further classiﬁed if the study interface is interactive (iSys), and if the paper reported inter- action use (iReport). ’?’ denotes cases where we were uncertain if the study interfaces were interactive. Qual study = qualitative evaluations with users and tasks; Quant expt = quantitative factorial experiments. Bolded numbers represent the 32 papers used in this review.
